articles.title: Epidemiological Alert: Chikungunya increase in the Region of the Americas, 13 February 2023 - World - ReliefWeb
articles.description: Situation Report in English on World about Health and Epidemic; published on 13 Feb 2023 by PAHO and WHO
articles.content: In 2022, the number of cases and deaths due to chikungunya in the Region of the Americas were above the numbers reported in previous years. The first weeks of 2023 have seen this trend continuing wit… [+2016 chars]

articles.title: American Heart Month Hits Close to Home - CSL Behring
articles.description: Jenny Mears is leading CSL’s clinical work in the cardiovascular therapy area. Learn how her father’s heart attack at 50 helped propel her toward a career in heart health.
articles.content: In February 1964, when the first American Heart Month was proclaimed, cardiovascular diseases were responsible for over half of all deaths in the United States annually. Today, even with the current … [+2677 chars]

articles.title: Sign language performer shines at Super Bowl - CTV News
articles.description: Rihanna wasn't the only one shining bright like a diamond during the Super Bowl. Videos of Justina Miles, a deaf American Sign Language interpreter, are racking up views online as admirers praise her energetic performances Sunday.
articles.content:
